generated_body: In the article titled "Envoy Was 'Obstacle' to Trump, Schiff Says: Impeachment Update," the user can expect a detailed account of recent developments in the impeachment inquiry, particularly focusing on statements made by Representative Adam Schiff regarding a diplomatic envoy. There may also be insights into the implications of this characterization for the broader impeachment narrative, though specifics on the envoy's identity and the context of these claims may remain uncertain.
